body_html: @F3PiX I haven‘t used Rails 5.1’s system tests, yet. But I thought capybara is not shipped with it and you‘re on your own making it work on your machine. That was my biggest beef with system tests‘ claim that it would Just Work(tm). Also, a recent Rails 5 greenfield app was generated with a config.generate_system_tests = false (or something like this) in application.rb
